channel.title: Half-Life 2 Props HD Textures Overhaul Mod Released
channel.description:
A "massive" Props HD textures overhaul mod, by themanclaw, has just been released on GameBanana's website.
[url='https://hl2.gamebanana.com/skins/136418']https://hl2.gamebanana.com/skins/136418[/url]
The author states the following:
"IMPORTANT NOTICE: This mod is intended to be used in conjunction with FakeFactory's Cinematic Mod ([b][u]though[/u][/b] it can definitely be used as a stand-alone, too!)."
Enjoy.

item.title: Half-Life 2 Props HD Textures Overhaul Mod Released
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Nice, been waiting for a reason to replay HL2. I’ll try it as soon as I get some free time.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life 2 Props HD Textures Overhaul Mod Released
